question: Please analyze this URL https://storyseeker.shop/
thought: I need to start by checking the status of the URL and then extract the text and hyperlinks from the website to analyze its content. The website is accessible. Now I need to extract the text and hyperlinks from the website to further analyze its content. The text extracted from the website does not show any signs of scam characteristics. I should now check for any hyperlinks on the website. The hyperlinks on the website lead to standard pages such as about us, contact us, track order, and login. There are no suspicious hyperlinks. I should now check the domain information using the RetrieveWHOIS tool to see if the company is legitimate. There was an error retrieving the domain information. I should check the DNS records to see if there are any abnormalities. There is no abnormality in the DNS records. I should now retrieve the certificate information from crt.sh to check if the website has a valid SSL certificate. The SSL certificate information indicates that the website has a valid SSL certificate. I should now summarize the findings to determine if the website is a scam. {
context: I want you to act as a professional scam website detection expert. You are tasked with analyzing the content of URLs given to you to determine if the URL is a scam website or not. Scam websites have the following features. 1. Unusually low prices and claims of free. 2. Claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible. 3. Texts that target human psychological weaknesses exist on websites. 4. Information on non-existent companies. 5. Handling different products from common e-commerce websites. 6. Inquiry phone number and email address are not appropriate for business use. 7. Privacy of customer information notation is ambiguous. 8. Payment methods are not common and are unusual. 9. The information listed has not been updated.
